text: The Money Pit is a 1986 American comedy movie directed by Richard Benjamin. The movie is a remake of Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House, a 1948 Cary Grant comedy. The Money Pit stars Tom Hanks and Shelley Long as a couple who try to fix a recently purchased house. It was filmed in New York City and Lattingtown, New York, and was co-executive produced by Steven Spielberg. ==References== Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies directed by Richard Benjamin
